Subject: Re: The Alliance
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"As you wish" Motormaster growls transforming to his truck mode and starts
to back away in reverse. Then, abruptly he stops and starts to push his
engine hard as he heads towards the small group of robots, Head on
collision on his mind.
